about_the_game:
Classified Projects is a collection of the various crazy ideas that either never quite made it into the original Retro Vaders game or were designed during the development of Retro Vaders: Reloaded. Gain access to 3 new Blasters, 3 new shields, 2 additional missions (featuring brand new enemies and bosses), and a further 15 in-game awards (and Steam Achievements) to unlock.

The "Classified Projects" DLC includes:
  • Operation: First Contact - A new short (10 wave) "prologue" Mission which lets players relive the first encounter with the Vaders leading to the creation of the "Classified Projects" research team and the development of new tech to fight back against the Vaders should they ever return.
  • Operation: Homebound - A new full length (25 wave) mission that takes place after the conclusion of Operation: Reloaded as the player must battle their way home through what remains of the Vader forces.
  • 3 new Blasters - Take control of the new "experimental" Zapper, Seeker and Bounce blasters developed especially for the Classified Projects DLC.
  • 3 New Shield Types - Switch out your shields for one of 3 new "experimental" shields developed especially for the Classified Projects DLC.
  • Unlimited Seasonal Mission Access - Play any of the seasonal missions whenever you like throughout the year.
  • 15 additional in-game awards (and Steam Achievements) to unlock!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4600 (NVIDIA and AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 10

short_description: A collection of brand new content developed especially for Retro Vaders: Reloaded that expands the game even further!
